- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Dave, You are so welcome. There are a few things we need to address for your reenrollment: · I have attached a net cash estimate for you based on your current MBO account settings. This estimate assumes single filing for state and federal, 2 withholding allowance deductions, single medical coverage, 40 hours a week, $110 per hour, and $500 a month in non-billable operating expenses deductions. I know you have used MBO before but I thought an updated estimate would provide a good refresher. If you want to update your benefits please log in and click on “personal info” -> “benefits” and let me know if you have any questions. · The other step is logging into MBO Access <https://access.mbopartners.com/> and completing the “Industry Expertise” and “Disciplines” sections of your profile. This information needed for our workmen’s comp. policy and must be completed before I can activate your account and get you billing. Your user ID and password is the same as your MBO Business Center. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. I'm going to head down there tomorrow morning for a short week and then the next few weeks should be full time. I'll update you sometime next week on any documents they want me to use for time and expenses and clarify the process.
please forward me any nextthing you need me to do as far as finishing my activation into the system, benefit enrollment info, etc.
Thanks again for your help, so glad we are moving forward
